subject: Tennis
Officiating (Sports)
United States Open (Tennis)
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: A line umpire, Lois Ann Goodman, was arrested while on the way to the United States Open qualifying rounds and was charged with killing her husband.
snippet: A line umpire, Lois Ann Goodman, was arrested while on the way to the United States Open qualifying rounds and was charged with killing her husband.
